full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Notification of Contract Opportunity**

**Reference Number:** cb-914-35227775  
**Amendment Number:** 4  
**Solicitation Number:** 5000076354

**Program Title:** Smart Renewables and Electrification Pathways (SREP) Program  
**Stream Title:** Recipient/Contribution Agreement Audits (Stream 8)  

**Contract Description:** Natural Resources Canada is seeking to establish a contract for Recipient/Contribution Agreement Audits for the Smart Renewables and Electrification Pathways (SREP) Program under the Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement (SA). The successful bidder will provide audit services on an "as and when requested" basis.

**Procurement Details:**

* **Trade Agreements:** The bid is open to contractors from participating countries, including Canada, under various trade agreements (Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, etc.)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Contract Term:** Up to three (3) years, with two (2) irrevocable option periods for extension
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Key Requirements:**

* The successful bidder must provide audit services for the SREP Program, as defined in Annex "A" – Statement of Work
* The bidder must meet the eligibility criteria set out in the tender package
* The bidder must comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and standards

**How to Bid:** Access the tender package through the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27754/175373_pass-stream-8-rfp-5000076354_notification_en_posting-december-15-2023.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27754/175373_pass-stream-8-rfp-5000076354_notification_en_posting-december-15-2023.pdf)

**Important Dates:**

* **Publication Date:** December 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 12, 2024, 17:00:00

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Gerald Baran
* **Email:** [gerald.baran@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:gerald.baran@nrc
